summary: The DynamoDB package in Moto provides a comprehensive mock of the AWS DynamoDB service. It includes a parser that translates condition and filter expressions into an abstract syntax tree, a set of DynamoDB‑specific exception classes for validation and operational errors, a request handler that implements the full range of DynamoDB API operations (table and item management, queries, scans, backups, imports/exports, transactions, and policy handling), and utility helpers for internal data processing.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with DynamoDB locally without contacting the real AWS service, by offering a fully functional in‑memory simulation of DynamoDB behavior.
